title: Trump says he is considering limited military strike on Iran
summary_full: Trump's new threat came a day after he appeared to give Iran about 10 days to agree to a deal to curb its nuclear programme.
summary_public: Trump's new threat came a day after he appeared to give Iran about 10 days to agree to a deal to curb its nuclear programme.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: considering limited military strike on Iran
